title: 【求助】attempting connection with missing mods [kimagine] at CLIENT
author: stszx
txt_content:
登录服务器时提示attempting connection with missing mods [kimagine] at CLIENT并且客户端闪退

话说我百度这东西居然没什么结果 都没人遇到过这种情况的么

replies.author: SotrForgotten
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: stszx
replies.txt_content:
SotrForgotten 发表于 2017-1-30 17:28
https://repo.prok.pw/pw/prok/KImagine/
加了之后依然进不去并且提示变成了attempting connection with missing mods [] at CLIENT

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
把客户端的crash report发上来
这个是正常现象 玩家正常进服也会刷出
应该是客户端那边的问题

replies.author: stszx
replies.txt_content: 问题已解决，我升级了一下客户端forge版本，帖子留着给以后遇到类似问题的人
